attributes.action: Have the courage to recognise that the Rail Network cannot function effectively or expand and develop sufficently as a privately owned, fragmented system and Renationalise accordingly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Railways were once the pride of the nation but thanks to sucessive government under investment and finally, privitatisation, the system is broken and customer comfort and convienience takes a back seat to maximising profit for TOC shareholders. With roads at the point of gridlock and the environment a key issue with regard to road expansion, it is now time for a government with vision for the country's transport infrastructure to take the railways into public onwership and invest in returning the system to its former glory as the best in the world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
